overview: This is a story about how the Beautiful Russia of the Future happened in one Russian region in 2020. For several months, citizens became free and freely protested against the arrest of the people's governor of the Khabarovsk Territory, Sergei Furgal. The protests were covered by independent journalists and bloggers who fell into the millstones of the Khabarovsk Carousel.
title: The Khabarovsk Carousel
